description: This file defines a ViewModel class 'NotesViewModel' for an Android application, managing a list of notes with functionalities for filtering by search query and tags. It interacts with a repository to fetch notes and exposes observable LiveData for the UI to observe.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel that supplies a filtered list of notes, supporting search and tag filtering, for an Android UI.

methods.name: applyFilters
methods.description: Filters a list of notes based on a search query and an optional tag.
